body:
I like continuous series.
 art is good and i like most of ozaki akira story but still for face still dont like it hehe
U all take porn comics way to seriously. Just enjoy all this free content.

hey you lil nazi 'porn police' pieces of shit - fuck off. y'all are so fucking stupid with your judgmental bullshit it would be funny if it wasnt so absolutely prude, lame and fascist. you dont get to tell everyone what kind of entertainment they should enjoy, ya dumb fucks. i looked at some of your faves - oh, lookie here, shotacon incest. society considers that objectively way more disgusting and shameful than vanilla ntr (which this ozaki comic barely even qualifies as). so yeah, i think what you are into is gross. but do i go around telling you how and when you should touch your retarded penis? no, i dont, and its for two reasons: 1. because i understand that every kind of human expression needs to exist in order for the things i like to also exist, it means the whole point of the internet is that we choose what we like and leave the other shit alone, and 2. im not some lil insecure nazi douchebag who feels the need to be the morality police for the world. y'all are LAME.

The concept of NTR does not exist in the continuity of this story, she's been doing this in front of everyone on live tv no one cares including the husband, this is just hentai as it was meant to be before it was toxified by NTR and by that I mean the word not the action.
What have those sad men ever done to you
I wonder if @Iexpectbetter is a guy or a girl??
@Iexpectedbetter Why the hate, dawg? We need to spread the love, man. I think you need a hug.
